Accede.origin: [they were invited to to the covenant]

1 a.definition: to become a party (as to an agreement) by associating oneself with others [they were invited to to the covenant]

sub_terms.b: to express approval or give consent [the banker asks for collateral. The debtor…, and transfers some of his property ", 139 F. Supp. 830 (1956)"]

1 a.s: and transfers some of his property

2.definition: to assume an office or position [to the governorship]

3 a.definition: to become added by way of growth, increase, improvement, or labor [the various improvements…hadto the realty and had become “fixtures” ", 608 S.W.2d 150 (1980)"]

sub_terms.b: to come into control or ownership of something [a trustee in bankruptcy specificallyto all property of the debtor ", 91 B.R. 738 (1988)"]

3 a.acceded: to the realty and had become “fixtures” "
3 a.s: to all property of the debtor "
